Class BattleBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIBattleGUI, BattleGUI

    public class BattleBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Chandler Scott This is the class that contains all of logic for the Battle Ship board. smallShip = 2 spaces(1) medShip = 3 spaces(2) bigShip = 4 spaces(1) biggestShip = 5 spaces(1)

      • onBoard

        public boolean onBoard(int x,
                       int y)
        Method to check if given coordinates are on the board.
        Parameters:
        x - represents rows.
        y - represents columns.
        Returns:
        true if on the board false if not on the board

      • isValidPegMove

        public boolean isValidPegMove(int x,
                              int y)
        Method to validate if the placement of the peg is valid.
        Parameters:
        x - position on the board representing a row.
        y - position on the board representing a column.
        Returns:
        true only if the spot is empty, or a ship value, and on the board.
